Kishu no Ju Sadanaga aka Teimei.  I believe the theme may be a foot 
bridge=
 although traditionally they have five planks if memory serves.

see Haynes=
 07752.0 pp 1559-1560 -- A group of artists who all signed, 
Kishu ju Sadan=
aga.  There were at least four or five generations.  
They seem to have com=
e from the early Edo Hoan school.  Some read 
this name as Teimei.  Furukaw=
a catalog pl. 27 #153.
SCE. W - 496-L-2, W - III - 159 - 161.
